channel.title: Shop Wont Sell Me Items
channel.description:
So I adjusted the donator shop to pk points and h'weens are 10,000 pkp
When I click the h'ween there's a message that says, "H'weens are 10,000 pkp" when I buy it, it won't sell me the h'ween and yes I have 100,000 pkp. How do I get it to sell me the items. and there's max h'weens in the shop so there's no reason it shouldnt sell me it

item.title: Shop Wont Sell Me Items
item.dc:creator: @jamie233 jamie233
item.description:
@jamie233 wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:5, topic:491166”][quote author=GodzFather link=topic=609399.msg4232777#msg4232777 date=1361388457]
Right click on the like picture and click buy, if not then u may not have enough points
[/quote]
Facepalm… Read his first post.

} else if (c.myShopId == 18) { if (PK_POINTS_VARIABLE >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){ PK_POINTS_VARIABLE -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID); c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1); c.getItems().resetItems(3823); } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have enough inventory space."); return } } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have enough Pk Points to buy this item."); return; }
Are you aware that you’re using Pest Control points rather than your variable that you use for pk points?[/quote]
Yes it’s a void knights shop

Read full topic

item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

GodzFather:

Right click on the like picture and click buy, if not then u may not have enough points

Facepalm… Read his first post.

} else if (c.myShopId == 18) { if (PK_POINTS_VARIABLE >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){ PK_POINTS_VARIABLE -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID); c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1); c.getItems().resetItems(3823); } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have enough inventory space."); return } } else { c.sendMessage("You do not have enough Pk Points to buy this item."); return; }
Are you aware that you’re using Pest Control points rather than your variable that you use for pk points?

item.title: Shop Wont Sell Me Items
item.dc:creator: @jamie233 jamie233
item.description:
@jamie233 wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

Post your code(s) for your pk point shop.

[code] if (c.myShopId == 18) {
if (c.pcPoints >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) {
if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0){
c.pcPoints -= getSpecialItemValue(itemID);
c.getItems().addItem(itemID,1);
c.getItems().resetItems(3823);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You do not have enough Pk Points to buy this item.”);
}

		}
	}[/code]
